message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I can't go as low as $9,500, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's make this happen!
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000 for the product.
